moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 9 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 9 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Turn left 90 degrees to face 12 o'clock. Return to parallel ready stance.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Step back to 6 o'clock into left walking stance. Perform low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward to 12 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 6 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 6 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Low knife-hand block
moves.description: Turn right 90 degrees to face 3 o'clock. Step into left walking stance with low knife-hand block.

moves.title: Middle inner forearm block
moves.description: Step forward facing 3 o'clock into right walking stance. Perform middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: Parallel ready stance
moves.description: Return to parallel ready stance, facing 12 o'clock.
